channel.title: Error with Java on Linux
channel.description:
Hi, I just bought a Linux VPS but I've never used Linux before
I'm trying to run my server on it and I get this
[code][root@pioneer codeusa]# dir content Engine.class io model net npcs Server.class test util world [root@pioneer codeusa]# java Server 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server (wrong name: net/com/c odeusa/Server)[/code]
The class is right there - why am I still getting the error?
Thanks,
David

item.title: Error with Java on Linux
item.dc:creator: @iDavid iDavid
item.description:
@iDavid wrote:

Hi, I just bought a Linux VPS but I’ve never used Linux before

I’m trying to run my server on it and I get this

[root@pioneer codeusa]# dir content Engine.class io model net npcs Server.class test util world [root@pioneer codeusa]# java Server 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server (wrong name: net/com/c odeusa/Server)

The class is right there - why am I still getting the error?

Thanks,

David
